Test Name: Inherited Motor Neuron Disease Gene Panel Analysis
Specimen Type: Whole blood (EDTA) or extracted DNA (from whole blood, saliva, buccal swabs)
Purpose: Identification of gene variants associated with inherited motor neuron diseases to aid diagnosis and clinical management.
Equipment: DNA extraction kit (Qiagen QIAamp DNA Blood Mini Kit), Qubit Fluorometer, NanoDrop, Illumina NGS platform (MiSeq/NextSeq), bioinformatics software
